data.name: Bogdanoff vs. Wojak Simulator
data.detailed_description:
A simple clicker game where you race against the clock to destroy as many Wojaks as possible by manipulating the markets using an intuitive UI.

Features:
-Retro pixel art style nuclear console view of the world
-Popups of Wojak's buying and selling popular stocks such as TSLA, GME etc.
-Rage sequences when destroying Wojak
-Wojak reactions to your actions
-2 Button flow:
1. Choose stock
2. Bompeet or Dompeet
3. Watch the Wojaks rage
data.about_the_game:
A simple clicker game where you race against the clock to destroy as many Wojaks as possible by manipulating the markets using an intuitive UI.

Features:
-Retro pixel art style nuclear console view of the world
-Popups of Wojak's buying and selling popular stocks such as TSLA, GME etc.

data.short_description: Ever wanted to manipulate the world financial markets? Well now you can! Fight against the Wojaks of the world as you manipulate the world markets and destroy their savings. Carefully pick the correct stock and then choose whether to "Bompeet" or "Dompeet"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: As long as it plays sound

Recommended:
